name: Little Blue Planet
description:
Welcome to Little Blue Planet!

[IF YOU CAN'T CONTROLL THE SHIP REFRESH THE PAGE]

You're job here is to defend from attackers!

[Up Arrow] or [Z] - Switch direction of Orbit.

[Space] or [X] - Shoot a laser!

Good luck out there, you'll need it.

Wonderful Vanilla Scratch Experience :0 
Little Blue Planet - Scratch Edition on Scratch (mit.edu)
